trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> módszerek.

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripRenderEventArgs class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A ToolStripRenderEventArgs osztály is biztosít az adatok a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"> </xref> a megadott osztály <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> és használata a megadott <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> kifestési használandó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> festeni kíván.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"> </xref> a megadott osztály <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>, használja a megadott <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> való festeni a megadott határoknak és a megadott <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> kifestési használandó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> festeni kíván.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> képviselő a terület kifestésének határain.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> , amely a háttérben, a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> rendelkező kerül meghívásra.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> képviselő a terület kifestésének határain.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> képviselő a terület kifestésének határain.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> , amely a háttérben, a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> rendelkező kerül meghívásra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> , amely a háttérben, a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> rendelkező kerül meghívásra.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> közötti átfedés terület képviselő egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> és annak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null`, the ConnectedArea property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>nem egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>vagy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>van `null`, a ConnectedArea tulajdonság adja vissza egy üres <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> közötti átfedés terület képviselő egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> és annak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> festeni használatával.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> festeni használatával.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> kell festeni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> kell festeni.
